You can delete the aliases above once the text is compiled as html -->
h2(LessonTitle). j.whatever
p. Short object description
h3. Description
p. Some info about the external
h3. Inputs
|_.Input number |_.Description | | 1st input | This input is used for blablbla | | 2d input | This input is used for blablbla | | 3d input | This input is used for blablbla |
h3. Outputs
|_.Output number |_.Description | | 1st output | This output is used for blablbla | | 2d output | This output is used for blablbla | | 3d output | This output is used for blablbla |
h3. Arguments
|_.Argument name |_.Type |_.Description | | foo | {integer/decimal/boolean/string/array/generic} | Description |
h3. Attributes
|_.Attribute name |_.Type |_.Description | | foo | {integer/decimal/boolean/string/array/generic} | Description |
h3. Messages
|_.Message name |_.Type |_.Description | | foo/bar | {integer/decimal/boolean/string/array/generic} | Description |
h3(seealso). See also
#"j.object":components/object.html #"j.object2":components/object2.html
